entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
